title: Where do we report bot accounts?
body:
It says to submit a ticket, but I can't find anything that it would fall under in the various issues that it gives you a choice with.
I had suspected "I have a question about LoL/Riot" then "Game and Features- Feedback" to be the way to go, but all it does is provide a link to the boards, where we aren't allowed to name names.

I mean, I only remember a couple ones because I blocked them, but still.

replies.body:
The best way to report bots is actually using the end-of-game stats screen reporting feature.  This allows us to track them much more effectively on top of all of the monitoring tools we employ to catch bots and ban those accounts.

Hopefully this is the last bot you will have to deal with!
No, they're the kind that add you out of the blue for phishing purposes. How do we get rid of them?

Ah, I see now.

That is a bit trickier, but we created some extensive tracking and monitoring tools to track those kinds of accounts specifically.  Given how they are set-up, they are typically easy to identify and suspend.
can you ban every account that takes ghost/heal in twisted treeline?

You're half right. You failed to explain where he should submit a ticket for the bot. Unless you couldn't care less about 1 bot.
For topics that don't seem to have a specific category (such as reporting players), you can use the **General Questions** category.
I think that one also took me to a boards link
Game & Features > Feedback directs you to the boards, but > General Questions won't.
